activities: Zendesk offers a Software as Service (SaaS)-based customer service/helpdesk solution to its customers, including customers from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. The platform enables Zendesk customers and their customers to exchange customer service-related information, which Zendesk then transfers among its platform and its customers servers and stores on behalf of its customers. Customers may include personal information within the data transferred on the Zendesk platform, however this is not the purpose of the platform or its intended use. Zendesk does not control or supervises the data inserted on its platform by its customers or their customers. Zendesk only interacts with such data by transferring and storing it in digital format, irrespective of content value or sensitivity.
contactoff1: Zendesk, 1019 Market Street, San Francisco, CA 94103
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online data collected through customer Sign-up, or as may be collected online by Zendesk's customers' customers, and placed on Zendesk's platform. Zendesk does not process any data manually. Employee Data Exports.
